systemInformation.name: pause1.fyre.ibm.com
systemInformation.databaseDriver: IBM Data Server Driver for JDBC and SQLJ 4.25.1301

propertyType.name: Owner
propertyType.description: Use to assign a person ownership or responsibility for this KRI.

propertyType.name: Breach Status
propertyType.description: This is a read only field calculated by comparing the Value with the Red and Yellow Thresholds, taking into account the Direction Information.

bundleType.name: POS-Qtemp
bundleType.description: OP IBM Services: needed to create this field group because field group OPSS_Qtemp is protected and so enum values "Type" field under it cannot be updated.

bundleType.name: POS-VRM-Issue
bundleType.description: Custom fields for Issue object type.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: È un campo di sola visualizzazione, calcolato confrontando il Valore con la Soglia Rossa e la Soglia Gialla, prendendo in considerazione le Informazioni Direzione.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Utilizzare per assegnare a una persona la titolarità o la responsabilità del KRI.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: This is a read only field calculated by comparing the Value with the Red and Yellow Thresholds, taking into account the Direction Information.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Use to assign a person ownership or responsibility for this KRI.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: 這是唯讀欄位，根據比較紅色臨界值和黃色臨界值並考慮方向資訊來計算。

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: 用來將此 KRI 的所有權或責任指派給人員。

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: This is a read only field calculated by comparing the Value with the Red and Yellow Thresholds, taking into account the Direction Information.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Use to assign a person ownership or responsibility for this KRI.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: Se trata de un campo de solo lectura que se calcula comparando el valor con los umbrales rojo y amarillo, a la vez que se tiene en cuenta la información sobre la dirección.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Se usa para asignar una propiedad personal o responsabilidad a este KRI.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: Este é um campo somente leitura ao comparar o Valor com os Limites Vermelho e Amarelo, considerando as Informações de Direção.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Use para designar a uma pessoa a propriedade ou responsabilidade deste KRI.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: 这是只读字段，通过比较红色阈值和黄色阈值并考虑方向信息而计算得出。

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: 用于将此 KRI 的个人所有权或责任分配给某个人。

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: Il s'agit d'une zone en lecture seule calculée en comparant la valeur aux seuils rouge et jaune, en tenant compte des informations du responsable.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Permet d'affecter un propriétaire ou un responsable pour cet indicateur clé de risques.

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: これは、方向性情報を考慮して、値を、赤色と黄色のしきい値に対して比較して計算される読み取り専用フィールドです。

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: この KRI の責任者つまり責任者の割り当てに使用します。

fieldString.name: Breach Status
fieldString.guidance: Dieses schreibgeschützte Feld wird durch den Vergleich des Wertes mit dem roten und gelben Schwellenwert berechnet, wobei auch die Richtungsinformationen berücksichtigt werden.

fieldString.name: Owner
fieldString.guidance: Zuweisen des Eigentums oder der Verantwortung für diese KRI an eine Person.
